3.12. Trace inequality with a non-positive measure
Let Ω be a bounded smooth domain in R^n and let σ be a real measure, not
necessarily positive, even a distribution, supported on ∂Ω.
Problem. Let n > p > 1 and let u be any function in C^∞(Ω). Find necessary
and sufficient condition on σ for the validity of the inequality
inf_{c∈R^1} ∫_{∂Ω} |u − c|^p dσ ≤ C ∫_{Ω} |∇u(x)|^p dx.
